results.title: Labour's secret 10-year plan to take Britain back into the EU

results.body: With a change in government looking likely next year, rejoiners will be in the ascendancy. So how might Sir Keir Starmer pursue?

results.title: UK formally rejects Brexit transition period extension
results.subtitle: Town and Country Mag
results.body: The U.K. Friday formally confirmed it will not seek an extension of the Brexit transition period beyond December 31, British Cabinet Office Minister Michael Gove said.

results.title: European Union and the UK agree to a Brexit transition period of 11 months
results.subtitle: CNBC
results.body: The U.K. will remain in the EU until the end of 2020, but with restricted powers, officials announced Monday.

results.title: UK and EU extend Brexit talks to Sunday
results.subtitle: CNN
results.body: British Prime Minister Boris Johnson and European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen have agreed to extend foundering Brexit trade talks until Sunday.

results.title: EU impatient for Brexit talks amid UK post-election chaos
results.subtitle: CNN
results.body: Five days on from the stalemate of the UK general election result, Europe's impatience with the Britain over Brexit is growing.
